DOT Bullish Wave Setup! Upside to 2.30 Incoming! ðŸš€  DOT fans, fresh TA from Rami Scalps spots a clean 5-wave impulse up on DOT followed by a corrective pullback that's holding strong at 1.82 support. This classic structure often signals the beginning of a bigger rally, with invalidation only below 1.65 and potential targets eyeing 2.30 first.  As long as support sticks, the bullish case stays alive - perfect for TON ecosystem watchers eyeing cross-chain plays.  Wave Structure Breakdown - Clear 5-wave advance marking wave 1 or A. - Pullback as wave 2 or B, respecting key fib levels. - Reaction higher could confirm wave 3 or C kickoff.  Key Levels to Watch - Support: 1.82 holding firm so far. - Invalidation: Drop under 1.65 flips the script bearish. - Upside: 2.30 initial target, higher highs beyond.  Broader Implications - Acceptance above 2.30 opens doors to extended gains. - Aligns with altcoin recovery narratives in play. - Chart visuals highlight precise entry zones.  This DOT setup is drawing solid engagement with likes and replies agreeing on the bounce potential. With markets stabilizing, it could spark fresh momentum soon.
